features.details: We do not impose any limits on the number of forms you can create in your account. This allows you to prepare forms in advance for future use and pay only when you truly need to increase the number of submissions.

You'll receive 50 monthly submissions for free. If you happen to go over that limit, don't worry, we'll still save your submissions for you. However, you'll need to upgrade your subscription to access the content. So, no need to worry about losing your submissions!
In the Free plan, you have access to the following security options: Honeypot Field, reCaptcha, and JavaScript Injection.
Receive email notifications whenever any of your forms are submitted. The email will contain all the data from the respective form.
Create a preconfigured message that will be automatically sent to your clients if an email field is present in the form.
You can export all your submissions in either CSV or JSON format at any time.
We take your privacy seriously. All your data are stored on servers in the EU. Read more in our Privacy Policy.

boxes.heading: Free
boxes.subtext: No credit card needed. Use it as long as you're fine with basic functions.

features.details: In our Standard plan, we provide you with 300 submissions. If you exceed this limit, we will continue to store new submissions, but you will not be able to view their content until you upgrade your subscription.
In the Standard plan, you have access to the following security options: Honeypot Field, reCaptcha, JavaScript Injection, Time Trap Field, hCaptcha.

With our Standard plan, you have the opportunity to attach files to your web form submissions. This feature is particularly useful when you need to request a screenshot of a problem or, for instance, a CV when your website visitor applies for a job.
This is the size of your cloud storage used for storing the file submissions.

Seamlessly integrate Comfyform with any other application or solution you are utilizing. Presently, we offer support for HubSpot and Google Sheets, and we have plans to promptly include support for Zapier and Slack.
We'll stop displaying our branding from all places where you'd be able to see it. No need to turn our branding off, we'll do this automatically for you.

boxes.heading: Standard
boxes.subtext: The best option to start with if you need to scale or receive files.

features.details: In our Premium plan, we provide you with 10.000 submissions. If you exceed this limit, we will continue to store new submissions, but you will not be able to view their content until you upgrade your subscription.
In the Premium plan, you have access to the following security options: Honeypot Field, reCaptcha, JavaScript Injection, Time Trap Field, hCaptcha, Language filter, Location filter.
Connect your own SMTP server for email notifications sent to you.
We use artificial intelligence to label your submissions by Smart Labels. You'll see the topic of the submission before you even start reading the content.
Using advanced AI, we'll prepare for you one possible positive and one negative answer for the form submission, allowing you to send either of them with just a click.
This is the size of your cloud storage used for storing the file submissions.

boxes.heading: Premium
boxes.subtext: Best for larger websites or companies expecting higher protection.

features.details: In our Premium plan, we provide you with 50.000 submissions. If you exceed this limit, we will continue to store new submissions, but you will not be able to view their content until you upgrade your subscription.

In the Elite plan, you have access all our security options: Honeypot Field, reCaptcha, JavaScript Injection, Time Trap Field, hCaptcha, Disposable email filter, Language filter, Location filter, Disposable email filter.
Get notified about important submissions using SMS. You'll be able to display the submission details with just one click and immediately make a call, ensuring you won't miss out on important leads.
This is the size of your cloud storage used for storing the file submissions.
Connect your internal apps or other solutions to our secured API and access all your data through it. Includes forms, submissions, subscription, and account.
If our service is not online as promised in the SLA, we will automatically refund you a pro-rata amount.

boxes.heading: Elite
boxes.subtext: Our high-tier subscription with all of our classy premium features.

enterprise.heading: Enterprise
enterprise.subtext: Custom solution for enterprise-grade expectations. Unlimited submissions, custom security options, dedicated storage, tailored AI, exclusive support.

payg.heading: Pay-as-you-go
payg.subtext: Get all features included in the Premium plan but only pay per each processed submission. You don't pay for submission that don't bypass your security rules.
